name: AWE net
overview:
Access to Education through Technology AWE is redefining access to safe, easy-to-manage, cost effective Educational Workstations for Libraries, Schools and Child Care. Since 1995, AWEâ€™s commitment to service excellence and our customersâ€™ success has led us to a unique position in the market place.

AWE develops products that solve the critical issues associated with Access to Educational through Technology. Schools and libraries want to focus on education and information, not technical support. AWE anticipates literacy needs of children and the content requirements of patrons of all ages. Our mission is to make a difference in the accessibility and use of information in our schools and libraries.

AWE has the knowledge base and experience to lead the market in developing and delivering quality educational and public access products. We understand that the mission of schools is the education our youth; and libraries are dedicated to providing their communities with the information, resources, and programs that provide equal opportunities to all.
